entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning and ending near noon then 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this morning then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 February 2023
